item.title: Neighboring Autoregressive Modeling for Efficient Visual Generation
item.description: NAR: Neighboring Autoregressive Modeling for efficient visual generation by locality-preserved, parallel decoding.

item.title: SegAgent: Exploring Pixel Understanding Capabilities in MLLMs by Imitating Human Annotator Trajectories
item.description: SegAgent: Improves MLLMs’ pixel understanding by mimicking human annotation, enabling mask refinement without altering output space.
